name: SAWRRY NOT SORRY
description:
Developped for the DISCROOM GAMEJAM,
SAWRRY NOT SORRY is the result of the work of Younes Lazreg, Philippe Duhamel and Benjamin BRIOLAT all members of Square Squid .
----------------------------------------------------

GENRE:  shooter,  versus,  platformer

Players: 2-4

Controls:  DualShock4,  Xbox 360 controller,  Xbox one controller

---------------------------------------------------

jump:  A

Shoot: RT

Move: left stick

Aim: right stick

Pause: START

---------------------------------------------------

In SNS you play with one to three friends  as very rad trees who shoot saws at each other through differents levels. The last man (tree?) standing is the victor.
